text: Oni v svoyom zabluzhdenii, kak lyudi, okruzhonnyye dozhdevoy tuchey s neba, mrakom, gromom i molniyey. Oni zatykayut pal'tsami ushi, opasayas' smerti ot udarov molniy i dumaya, chto takim obrazom oni smogut predotvratit' smert'. Kogda im nisposylayetsya Koran, preduprezhdayushchiy o nakazanii neveruyushchikh i ob"yasnyayushchiy yasnyy Svet very, oni otklonyayutsya ot nego i dumayut, chto ikh otstraneniye spasot ikh ot nakazaniya Allakha, a Allakh ob"yemlet neveruyushchikh
